widget.type: NEW INTERNS  |  NEW FULL TIME EMPLOYEES
widget.header: Getting to Know the New Talent at Justia

config.title: Andres Sanchez
config.description: I'm a Software Engineer born in La Paz, Baja California Sur. I like coding and learning new technologies, and my goal is to keep growing and use my skills to help others succeed. My hobbies are playing video games and watching movies and TV series. I like to talk about any topic except football.

config.title: Sarah Dondysh
config.description: Hi everyone! My name is Sarah Dondysh. I'm 30 years old and a Bay Area, California native. I've been an admin for eight years, doing various work from reception to process improvement and marketing. I'm a huge Disney fan, especially the parks. If you have any questions or want to plan a trip, ask me! I'm always happy to help. I'm excited to be part of the Justia team and can't wait to get to know each of you.
